## 테이블로 나타내기

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73538957/114068296-bb707780-98d8-11eb-960f-be6e24cf87b7.png)


## sql 언어로 나타내기
```mysql
-- MySQL Script generated by MySQL Workbench
-- Fri Apr  9 02:07:56 2021
-- Model: New Model    Version: 1.0
-- MySQL Workbench Forward Engineering

SET @OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS=@@UNIQUE_CHECKS, UNIQUE_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@@FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS, FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_SQL_MODE=@@SQL_MODE, SQL_MODE='ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES,NO_ZERO_IN_DATE,NO_ZERO_DATE,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION';

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema KleagueDB
-- -----------------------------------------------------

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema KleagueDB
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `KleagueDB` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `KleagueDB` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `KleagueDB`.`Stadium`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `KleagueDB`.`Stadium` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL,
  `Name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Seat_count` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `KleagueDB`.`Team`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `KleagueDB`.`Team` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL,
  `Name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Owner` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `Stadium_id` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `fk_Team_Stadium1_idx` (`Stadium_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Team_Stadium1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Stadium_id`)
    REFERENCES `KleagueDB`.`Stadium` (`id`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `KleagueDB`.`Player`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `KleagueDB`.`Player` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL,
  `Name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `Position` CHAR(2) NULL,
  `Back_no` INT NULL,
  `Team_id` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `fk_Player_Team1_idx` (`Team_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Player_Team1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Team_id`)
    REFERENCES `KleagueDB`.`Team` (`id`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `KleagueDB`.`Schedule`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `KleagueDB`.`Schedule` (
  `Sche_data` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `Gubun` CHAR(2) NOT NULL,
  `Stadium_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `Home_Team_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `Away_Team_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `Hometeam_score` INT NULL,
  `Awayteam_score` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`Sche_data`, `Stadium_id`),
  INDEX `fk_Schedule_Stadium_idx` (`Stadium_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_Schedule_Team1_idx` (`Home_Team_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_Schedule_Team2_idx` (`Away_Team_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Schedule_Stadium`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Stadium_id`)
    REFERENCES `KleagueDB`.`Stadium` (`id`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Schedule_Team1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Home_Team_id`)
    REFERENCES `KleagueDB`.`Team` (`id`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Schedule_Team2`
    FOREIGN KEY (`Away_Team_id`)
    REFERENCES `KleagueDB`.`Team` (`id`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
```
